results.title: Safety in ceramics
results.creator_credit: K Starbuck and Moorabbin College of TAFE
results.brief_description: Introduces basic safety precautions for a ceramic studio when using clay as a creative medium in the classroom. Addresses safety and health hazards inherent in clay dust, the kiln, glazes, electricity and tools.

results.title: Sacred hearts
results.creator_credit: Barbara Rennie, Dee Dee Glass and Reality Productions
results.brief_description: The torment, fear and severe discipline of impressionable schoolgirls at a Catholic orphanage in wartime Britain are brought vividly to the screen in “Sacred hearts”. Sister Thomas, (Anna Massey) is a major contributor to the atmosphere of intellectual, sexual and emotional repression at the convent school, where no signs of affection are tolerated. Excellently acted and constructed, this film exposes some of the myths and rituals which make up our perceptions of convent schools. The cast also includes Katrin Carlidge and Oona Kirsh.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Barbara Rennie, Dee Dee Glass and Reality Productions

results.title: Rush hour space age
results.creator_credit: Litton Industries and Space Age Images
results.brief_description: What is the solution to the problem of the automobile which is threatening to kill cities and their inhabitants? This film proposes that mass transportation systems are the answer and demonstrates that Chicago, New York and London are doing something about it by improving the efficiency and economy of existing systems. Some must take more drastic action. For Example, San Francisco, has set up a rapid transport system authority to combat the problem. Mention is made of the first automatic public transport ticketing system.
